meanings.definition: A substance added to something in small quantities, typically to improve or preserve it.
meanings.sent1: The food company uses additives to make their products last longer on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The chef decided to add some additives to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The additives in the recipe danced together to create a delicious symphony of taste.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like additives to his day, making it brighter and more enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The additives in the paint brought out vibrant colors that caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A substance added to another substance to alter or improve its properties.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used additives to improve the performance of the engine.
meanings.sent2: The farmer added additives to the soil to increase crop yield.
meanings.sent3: The additives in the experiment had a party, changing the substance into something new.
meanings.sent4: His words were like additives to the conversation, making it more interesting and engaging.
meanings.sent5: The additives in the shampoo left her hair soft and shiny after just one use.
